coverage_details.std: Treatment of STD is covered regardless of infection route including: Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid.
coverage_details.premature_babies_treatment: Covered up to annual limit; care for premature babies is covered.
coverage_details.checkup: Adult vaccinations, checkup and family doctors covered as per National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines.
coverage_details.vaccination: SR 9,999,999.99 for children per MOH schedule; adult vaccinations covered.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit SR 2000; Frames covered twice for children up to 14 years.
coverage_details.birth_control: Family Planning: Cost of birth control for females covered up to SR 1,500. Contraceptive methods are covered up to 1,500 SAR (not covered for Parents scheme).
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Any listed surgical obesity procedure (excluding Gastric Sleeve) is covered if BMI ≥ 40 or BMI ≥ 35 with complications, to 20,000 SAR limit.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Gastric Sleeve and related approved surgical procedures covered per medical/clinical guidelines up to 20,000 SAR.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Surgery of the donor donating life organs covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: Cost of neonatal metabolic screening for newborns up to SR 100,000. National program for early detection for newborns covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.psychiatric: Up to SR 50,000, including non-acute psychiatry. Up to 4 visits. Psychiatric cases covered for all schemes.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: SR 6,000; Newborn hearing screening and congenital heart anomaly covered up to SR 100,000.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000; Dental scaling covered once per year; Crowns, bridges, pins, and posts related to crowns covered; 20% up to 100 SAR deductible.
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Covered up to annual limit; coverage up to 30 days from date of birth under mother's policy.
coverage_details.circumcision: Circumcision for males up to 500 SAR.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Cost included; National program for early detection for newborns covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit; Non-acute congenital illnesses up to SR 50,000 for all schemes; Early detection program for congenital heart malformations in newborns; Early detection program for deafness of newborns.
coverage_details.maternity: Anti-natal care and NVD up to 15,000 SAR. Maternity complications, Caesarean section, and legal abortion up to annual limit. Not covered for parents.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000; Contact lenses are included up to this limit.
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Ear piercing for females covered up to 300 SAR.
coverage_details.screening: General screening covered (see neonatal screening and checkup).
coverage_details.disability_cases: Disability cases including metabolic screening for newborns covered up to SR 100,000; Rehabilitation and artificial limbs up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.donor_organ_harvesting: Surgery for organ donor covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR. Companion cost is covered for members and parents. Pre-existing and existing chronic conditions covered with medication. Joint replacement surgeries covered up to 50,000 SAR. Telemedicine covered. Home Healthcare (post-surgery wound dressing, urinary catheter replacement, IV fluids). International S.O.S emergency medical transport from abroad to Saudi Arabia only. Medical devices for diabetes, pressure, and steam covered. Nutritional supplements and vitamins/minerals covered if medically necessary and prescribed by authorized SFDA physician. Local ambulance covered. Allergy tests/treatment covered if prescribed. Intensive care unit and psoriasis treatment covered. Family doctors/checkup covered. Infectious diseases requiring isolation at MOH-appointed hospitals are covered. Medication pre-auth limit equal to overall annual limit. Babies milk up to 24 months as per medical need. Epidural injection for delivery is covered. All CHI benefits covered unless a specific limit above is mentioned.
